mapper.sql: select id, verss, isdel, createtime, createuse, updatetime, updateuse, lcid, sqr, sqlx, ksxid, gzkssj, gzjssj, gzsc, gzjs, sqfz, shzt from wf_sqb_sjfb
mapper.select: SELECT u.nick_name yhxm,u.user_id yhid, dept.dept_name bmmc, TIMESTAMPDIFF( YEAR, u.birthday, CURDATE()) nl, dict.dict_label xbmc FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON u.dept_id = dept.dept_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = 'sys_user_sex' ) dict ON dict.dict_value = u.sex WHERE u.user_id = #{yhid}

SELECT u.nick_name yhxm,u.user_id yhid, dept.dept_name bmmc, TIMESTAMPDIFF( YEAR, u.birthday, CURDATE()) nl, dict.dict_label xbmc FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON u.dept_id = dept.dept_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = 'sys_user_sex' ) dict ON dict.dict_value = u.sex WHERE u.STATUS = '0' AND u.del_flag = '0' and u.user_name !='admin' and u.nick_name like concat('%', #{ryxm}, '%') order by nick_name

SELECT u.nick_name yhxm,u.user_id yhid, dept.dept_name bmmc,cyryb.id, TIMESTAMPDIFF( YEAR, u.birthday, CURDATE()) nl,cyryb.df,cyryb.shdf,cyryb.gznr,cyryb.bmid, dict.dict_label xbmc FROM wf_sqb_cyrb cyryb left join sys_user u on cyryb.yhid = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON u.dept_id = dept.dept_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sys_dict_data WHERE dict_type = 'sys_user_sex' ) dict ON dict.dict_value = u.sex WHERE cyryb.sqid = #{id} and cyryb.isdel = 0 order by id

select sjfb.id, sjfb.verss, sjfb.isdel, sjfb.createtime, sjfb.createuse, sjfb.updatetime, sjfb.updateuse,DATE_FORMAT(sjfb.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') sbsj, sjfb.gzkssj, sjfb.gzjssj, sjfb.gzsc, sjfb.gzjs,sjfb.sqfz, sjfb.shzt,dicta.dict_label shztmc, sjfb.sqlx,dictb.dict_label sqlxmc, sjfb.sqr,u.nick_name sqrxm, sjfb.ksxid,khxb.khxmc, sjfb.lcid,ywlcb.lcmc,ywlcb.sfkbh from wf_sqb_sjfb sjfb left join wf_khxb khxb on khxb.id = sjfb.ksxid left join wf_ywlcb ywlcb on ywlcb.id = khxb.lcid left join sys_user u on sjfb.sqr = u.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'workload_khxlx') dictb on dictb.dict_value = sjfb.sqlx left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'flow_status') dicta on dicta.dict_value = sjfb.shzt where sjfb.isdel=0 and find_in_set(#{yhid},sjfb.shr) > 0 and sjfb.sqr = #{sqr} and sjfb.sqlx = #{sqlx} and sjfb.ksxid = #{ksxid} and sjfb.gzjs like concat('%', #{gzjs}, '%') order by sjfb.createtime desc

select sjfb.id, sjfb.verss, sjfb.isdel, sjfb.createtime, sjfb.createuse, sjfb.updatetime, sjfb.updateuse,DATE_FORMAT(sjfb.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') sbsj, sjfb.gzkssj, sjfb.gzjssj, sjfb.gzsc, sjfb.gzjs,sjfb.sqfz, sjfb.shzt,dicta.dict_label shztmc, sjfb.sqlx,dictb.dict_label sqlxmc, sjfb.sqr,u.nick_name sqrxm, sjfb.ksxid,khxb.khxmc, sjfb.lcid,ywlcb.lcmc,ywlcb.sfkbh from wf_sqb_sjfb sjfb left join wf_khxb khxb on khxb.id = sjfb.ksxid left join wf_ywlcb ywlcb on ywlcb.id = khxb.lcid left join sys_user u on sjfb.sqr = u.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'workload_khxlx') dictb on dictb.dict_value = sjfb.sqlx left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'flow_status') dicta on dicta.dict_value = sjfb.shzt where sjfb.isdel=0 and sjfb.id in ( select sqid from wf_sqb_shjlb shjlb LEFT JOIN wf_sqb_sjfb sjfb ON sjfb.id = shjlb.sqid where shjlb.shr=#{yhid} and sjfb.sqr != #{yhid} ) and sjfb.sqr = #{sqr} and sjfb.sqlx = #{sqlx} and sjfb.ksxid = #{ksxid} and sjfb.gzjs like concat('%', #{gzjs}, '%') order by sjfb.createtime desc

select sjfb.id, sjfb.verss, sjfb.isdel, sjfb.createtime, sjfb.createuse, sjfb.updatetime, sjfb.updateuse,DATE_FORMAT(sjfb.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') sbsj, sjfb.gzkssj, sjfb.gzjssj, sjfb.gzsc, sjfb.gzjs,sjfb.sqfz, sjfb.shzt,dicta.dict_label shztmc, sjfb.sqlx,dictb.dict_label sqlxmc, sjfb.sqr,u.nick_name sqrxm, sjfb.ksxid,khxb.khxmc, sjfb.lcid,ywlcb.lcmc from wf_sqb_sjfb sjfb left join wf_khxb khxb on khxb.id = sjfb.ksxid left join wf_ywlcb ywlcb on ywlcb.id = khxb.lcid left join sys_user u on sjfb.sqr = u.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'workload_khxlx') dictb on dictb.dict_value = sjfb.sqlx left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'flow_status') dicta on dicta.dict_value = sjfb.shzt where sjfb.isdel=0 and sjfb.sqr = #{sqr} and sjfb.sqlx = #{sqlx} and sjfb.ksxid = #{ksxid} and sjfb.gzjs like concat('%', #{gzjs}, '%') order by sjfb.createtime desc

select sjfb.id, sjfb.verss, sjfb.isdel, sjfb.createtime, sjfb.createuse, sjfb.updatetime, sjfb.updateuse,DATE_FORMAT(sjfb.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') sbsj, sjfb.gzkssj, sjfb.gzjssj, sjfb.gzsc, sjfb.gzjs,sjfb.sqfz, sjfb.shzt,dicta.dict_label shztmc, sjfb.sqlx,dictb.dict_label sqlxmc, sjfb.sqr,u.nick_name sqrxm, sjfb.ksxid,khxb.khxmc, sjfb.lcid,ywlcb.lcmc from wf_sqb_sjfb sjfb left join wf_khxb khxb on khxb.id = sjfb.ksxid left join wf_ywlcb ywlcb on ywlcb.id = khxb.lcid left join sys_user u on sjfb.sqr = u.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'workload_khxlx') dictb on dictb.dict_value = sjfb.sqlx left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'flow_status') dicta on dicta.dict_value = sjfb.shzt where sjfb.isdel=0 and sjfb.sqr = #{sqr} and sjfb.sqlx = #{sqlx} and sjfb.ksxid = #{ksxid} and sjfb.gzjs like concat('%', #{gzjs}, '%') order by sjfb.createtime desc

select lcjdb.id,lcjdb.lcid,lcjdb.jdmc,lcjdb.shjs,ifnull(lcjdb.px,99) px, shjlb.id shjlid from (select wf_sqb_shjlb.* from wf_sqb_shjlb where sqid=#{sqid} order by updatetime desc limit 0,1) shjlb left join wf_ywlcjdb lcjdb on lcjdb.lcid = shjlb.lcid and shjlb.dqjdid = lcjdb.id

select shjlb.*, dicta.dict_label shztmc, case when shjlb.shr is null or shjlb.shr='' then u.nick_name else u1.nick_name end yhxm, DATE_FORMAT(shjlb.updatetime,'%Y-%m-%d') czsj from wf_sqb_shjlb shjlb left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='flow_status') dicta on dicta.dict_value=shjlb.shzt left join wf_sqb_sjfb sjfb on shjlb.sqid=sjfb.id left join sys_user u on sjfb.sqr=u.user_id left join sys_user u1 on shjlb.shr=u1.user_id where sqid=#{sqid} order by updatetime desc

select lcjdb.id,lcjdb.px,lcjdb.lcid,lcjdb.jdmc,lcjdb.shjs,Ifnull(role.role_name,'申报人') jsmc from wf_sqb_sjfb sqb left join wf_ywlcjdb lcjdb on sqb.lcid = lcjdb.lcid left join sys_role role on role.role_id=lcjdb.shjs where sqb.id=#{sqid} order by lcjdb.px

select sjfb.id, sjfb.verss, sjfb.isdel, sjfb.createtime, sjfb.createuse, sjfb.updatetime, sjfb.updateuse, sjfb.lcid, sjfb.sqr, sjfb.sqlx, sjfb.ksxid,dictb.dict_label sqlxmc, sjfb.gzkssj, sjfb.gzjssj, sjfb.gzsc, sjfb.gzjs, sjfb.sqfz, sjfb.shzt, khxb.khxmc from wf_sqb_sjfb sjfb left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'workload_khxlx') dictb on dictb.dict_value = sjfb.sqlx left join wf_khxb khxb on khxb.id=sjfb.ksxid where sjfb.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wf_sqb_sjfb (id,verss,isdel,createtime,createuse,updatetime,updateuse,lcid, sqr,sqlx,ksxid,gzkssj,gzjssj, gzsc,gzjs,sqfz,shzt) values (#{id},1,0,sysdate(),#{createuse},sysdate(),#{updateuse},(select lcid from wf_khxb where id=#{ksxid}), #{sqr},#{sqlx},#{ksxid},#{gzkssj},#{gzjssj}, #{gzsc},#{gzjs},#{sqfz},#{shzt} )

insert into wf_sqb_cyrb (id,verss,isdel,createtime,updatetime, sqid,yhid,df,shdf,gznr,bmid) values (#{id},1,0,sysdate(),sysdate(), #{sqid},#{yhid},#{df},#{df},#{gznr},(select dept_id from sys_user where user_id=#{yhid}) )
mapper.update: update wf_sqb_cyrb set shdf=#{shdf} where id=#{id}
update wf_sqb_sjfb set shzt=#{shzt} where id=#{id}
update wf_sqb_sjfb set shr=#{shr} where id=#{id}
update wf_sqb_sjfb set shzt=#{shzt},shr=#{shr},verss=verss+1 where id=#{id} and verss=#{verss}
mapper.select: select group_concat(user_id) from sys_user where user_id in (select user_id from sys_user_role where role_id=#{roleid})

select lcjdb.*,shjlb.id shjlid from (select wf_sqb_shjlb.* from wf_sqb_shjlb where sqid=#{sqid} order by updatetime desc limit 0,1) shjlb left join wf_ywlcjdb lcjdb on lcjdb.lcid = shjlb.lcid and shjlb.dqjdid = lcjdb.id
select * from wf_ywlcjdb where lcid=#{lcid} order by px
select * from wf_ywlcjdb where lcid=(select lcid from wf_sqb_sjfb where id=#{sqid}) order by px

select shjlb.*,lcjdb.id lcjdid,lcjdb.px lcpx,lcjdb.jdmc lcjdmc,lcjdb.shjs lcshjs from wf_sqb_shjlb shjlb left join wf_ywlcjdb lcjdb on lcjdb.id=shjlb.xyjdid where sqid=#{sqid} order by updatetime desc limit 0,1
select id,lcid from wf_sqb_sjfb where id=#{sqid}

select t.*,jqfszb.jqbs from ( select cyrb.sqid,cyrb.yhid,cyrb.df,cyrb.shdf,u.birthday,u.birthday as nl,u.sex,khxb.fzlx from wf_sqb_cyrb cyrb left join sys_user u on cyrb.yhid=u.user_id left join wf_sqb_sjfb sqb on cyrb.sqid = sqb.id left join wf_khxb khxb on khxb.id=sqb.ksxid where sqid=#{sqid}) t left join wf_jqfszb jqfszb on t.nl=jqfszb.nl and t.sex=jqfszb.lx
select * from wf_rykhfsb where yhid=#{yhid} and nd = year(CURRENT_DATE)
mapper.delete:
delete from wf_sqb_sjfb where id in
#{id}
